body:
Landing pages can be useful for drawing your visitors' attention to a particular product or service feature, or to refine messaging specific to the campaign. If you decide to move forward with a landing page separate to your website, this is for you.

Requirements for your landing page

1. Your landing page must contain sufficient brand notification. Your business should be clearly associated with landing page content.


2. Your main websiteâ€™s homepage and privacy policy must be accessible from your landing page.


3. If your landing page contains a unique offer not available on your website, it must disclose the terms of the offer clearly and completely.


4. Any claims must be verifiable.


5. Any collection or processing of personal information must be done on a secure server (https://).
